answerText: Giacomo Girolamo Casanova de Seingalt[10] This Austrian author expanded on an episode in which Casanova seduces a woman who pretends to be a castrato in Casanova's Homecoming. He is best known for Professor Bernhardi and The Road into the Open.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Seven Lakes/Rockefeller  | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man, who went on strict diets of nitrate water in order to handle his various venereal diseases, was famed for his mysterious escape from "The Leads." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author whose only true love between his tens of thousands of sexual conquests was the French woman Henriette, whom he wrote about in The Story of My Life. His name is synonymous with the art of seduction.
